name: X-Force Exchange
description: IBM X-Force Exchange is a threat intelligence sharing platform enabling research on security threats, aggregation of intelligence, and collaboration with peers

options.name: X-Force Exchange Host
options.description: The host to use for the X-Force Exchange API

options.name: API Key
options.description: API key to use for authentication with X-Force Exchange

options.name: API Key Password
options.description: Password to use for authentication with X-Force Exchange

options.name: Minimum Score
options.description: Minimum risk score necessary to display a matching entry (does not apply to malware/hash entities). Valid values are 0 to 10.

options.name: Minimum Malware Risk
options.description: Minimum risk level necessary to display a matching entry (only applies to malware/hash entities).  Valid values are "low", "medium", and "high"

options.name: Ignored List
options.description: Comma delimited List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to X-Force Exchange (private IP addresses are never sent)

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.
